ptolemy.actor.lib.jjs.modules.udpSocket

Class UDPSocketHelper

  • java.lang.Object
    • ptolemy.actor.lib.jjs.HelperBase
      • ptolemy.actor.lib.jjs.VertxHelperBase
        • ptolemy.actor.lib.jjs.modules.udpSocket.UDPSocketHelper

  • public class UDPSocketHelper
extends VertxHelperBase
    A helper class for the udpSocket module in JavaScript. See the documentation of that module for instructions.

    Ptolemy II 11.0
    Version:

    Author:

    Proposed Rating:

                                                jdk.nashorn.api.scripting.ScriptObjectMirror helping)

        Parameters:
